text: Agar in zaalimon ke paas zameen ki saari daulat bhi ho, aur utni hi aur bhi, to yeh roz-e-qayamat ke buray azaab se bachne ke liye sab kuch fidiye (expiation/ redeem) mein dene ke liye tayyar ho jayenge. Wahan Allah ki taraf se inke saamne woh kuch aayega jiska inhon ne kabhi andaza hi nahin kiya hai
